title: Dense QC$_2$D. What's up with that?!?
authors:
Simon Hands, Seyong Kim, Dale Lawlor, Andrew Lee-Mitchell and Jon-Ivar
  Skullerud
abstract:
We present recent updates and results from QC$_2$D (Two Colour QCD)
simulations at non-zero baryon density, including progress toward determining
the speed of sound.
